title: How to cancel my Urban Outfitters online order - Quora

response.answer_text: You need to contact their customer service dept: you can call on the phone #800–282–2200 or you can chat with them on their website. If the order arrives at your home, you might be able to take it to your local store and return it that way. If not, then contact them to ask them how to return merchandise. They might send a postage paid label to send the merchandise back to them. Good luck!!
